TEXT.TITLE: MOTEL 6 LP <SIX> SETS CASH DISTRIBUTION
TEXT.BODY: Qtly cash distribution 30.5 cts vs 18.4 cts prior Pay May 15 Record March 31 Note: Prior-quarter dividend was an initial payout based on operations for a partial fourth quarter in 1986. Reuter
